external_references.description: Booz Allen Hamilton   When The Lights Went Out Retrieved. 2019/10/22

description: During the [2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0028), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used [BlackEnergy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0089) to communicate between compromised hosts and their command-and-control servers via HTTP post requests. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)
